Class MinHashSimilarities

  • java.lang.Object
    • MinHashSimilarities

  • public class MinHashSimilarities
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> allDocs
      The list of all documents built into the MinHash matrix
      private MinHash mh
      The MinHash instance
      private int[][] minHashMatrix
      The int[][] representation of the MinHash matrix
      private int[][] termDocumentMatrix
      The term document matrix used to build the MinHash matrix

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MinHashSimilarities(java.lang.String folder, int numPermutations)
      Creates an instance of MinHash, and calls the methods termDocumentMatrix and minHashMatrix to store the respective matrices.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double approximateJaccard(java.lang.String file1, java.lang.String file2)
      Estimates and returns the Jaccard similarity of documents file1 and file2 by comparing the MinHash signatures of file1 and file2
      double exactJaccard(java.lang.String file1, java.lang.String file2)
      Gets names of two files (in the document collection) file1 and file2 as parameters and returns the exact Jaccard Similarity of the files.
      int[] minHashSig(java.lang.String fileName)
      Returns the MinHash signature of a document

    • Constructor Detail

      • MinHashSimilarities

        public MinHashSimilarities(java.lang.String folder,
                           int numPermutations)
        Creates an instance of MinHash, and calls the methods termDocumentMatrix and minHashMatrix to store the respective matrices.
        Parameters:
        folder - THe folder containing the documents to process
        numPermutations - The number of permutations to use when creating the MinHash matrix

    • Method Detail

      • exactJaccard

        public double exactJaccard(java.lang.String file1,
                           java.lang.String file2)
        Gets names of two files (in the document collection) file1 and file2 as parameters and returns the exact Jaccard Similarity of the files.
        Parameters:
        file1 - The first file to compare
        file2 - The second file to compare
        Returns:
        The exact Jaccard similarity between the two files

      • approximateJaccard

        public double approximateJaccard(java.lang.String file1,
                                 java.lang.String file2)
        Estimates and returns the Jaccard similarity of documents file1 and file2 by comparing the MinHash signatures of file1 and file2
        Parameters:
        file1 - The first file to compare
        file2 - The second file to compare
        Returns:
        The estimated Jaccard similarity using the MinHash matrix

      • minHashSig

        public int[] minHashSig(java.lang.String fileName)
        Returns the MinHash signature of a document
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file
        Returns:
        The MinHash signature
